item.description:
Hello all! Please accept my apologies for not organizing something more recently...my travel schedule has been really hectic. I owe a couple of you e-mail responses, and I do thank you for your suggestions. One person has asked for a Sunday brunch, which sounds like a great idea...I'm going to be out the next couple of Sundays, but I'll try to put something together for that when I can.

This meetup, however, is an attempt to try to bring some people together this week. We'll meet this Thursday at Clery's Bar & Restaurant in the Back Bay, one block south of the Back Bay T/train station, at the intersection of Dartmouth & Columbus. I don't want to do Friday due to the madness that will surely surround the Red Sox game. So please RSVP if you can make it, and I hope to meet many of you! As always, if you have questions, feel free to e-mail me...I promise to respond when I can :-).
item.name: Dinner & drinks in Back Bay
